pxchat.net
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  pxchat.net.Server

public class Server
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the server for pxchat. It uses a TCP server to listen on a specified port and handles incoming data by processing and forwarding the frames.

Author:
Markus DÃ¶llinger

          The frame adapter listener used for the sockets connected to the server.

          status of the whiteboard (locked/unlocked) for users who joined the session

          The TCP server listener used to process events of the underlying server socket.

Field Detail

lock

private java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock lock
This lock is used to prevent concurrent access to the frame adapters by multiple threads.

server

private TCPServer server
The underlying TCP server

serverFrameAdapter

private ServerFrameAdapter serverFrameAdapter
The frame adapter used to control the data flow

authList

private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> authList
A mapping of user name to password used to authenticate with the server. Each pair can only be connected once.

userList

private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> userList
A mapping of session id to user name of the clients currently connected.

imgReceivers

private java.util.Vector<ServerImageReceiver> imgReceivers
A list of image receivers receiving and transferring images from and to clients.

imgSenders

private java.util.HashMap<FrameAdapter,java.util.Vector<ImageSender>> imgSenders
A list of image senders for each connected adapter. It is used to transfer images to clients that connected after the image was created.

backgroundCache

private BackgroundFrame backgroundCache
The current background of the whiteboard. Only the current frame has to be cached because setting the background does not have any side-effects.

paintObjectCache

private FrameQueue paintObjectCache
A queue of all draw commands in the correct order. Each new client will receive this queue in order to synchronize with the others.

lockCache

private LockFrame lockCache
status of the whiteboard (locked/unlocked) for users who joined the session

nextImageID

private int nextImageID
The next image id that will be send the the client requesting it.

tcpServerListener

private TCPServerListener tcpServerListener
The TCP server listener used to process events of the underlying server socket.

serverFrameAdapterListener

private ServerFrameAdapterListener serverFrameAdapterListener
The server frame adapter listener used to process events of the frame adapter.

frameAdapterListener

private FrameAdapterListener frameAdapterListener
The frame adapter listener used for the sockets connected to the server.

Constructor Detail

Server

public Server()
Constructs a new pxchat server.

Method Detail

close

public void close()
Closes the server and disconnects all clients.

getNextImageID

private int getNextImageID()
Generates a unique image id by incrementing a counter.

Returns:
The next image id

getUserList

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getUserList()
Returns the current user list of the server. THe user list is a mapping of session id to user name.

Returns:
The user list

listen

public void listen(int port)
            throws java.io.IOException
Lets the server listen on the specified port. If the server is already listening, nothing is done.

Parameters:
port - The port to listen on
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when opening the socket

sendUserList

private void sendUserList()
Sends the current user list to all clients

setAuthList

public void setAuthList(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> authList)
Sets the authentication list (authList) of the server.

Parameters:
authList - The new authentication list
